Address.value: 777-106TH AVENUE N.E., BELLEVUE, Washington, 98004, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Paccar is a leading manufacturer of medium- and heavy-duty trucks under the premium brands Kenworth and Peterbilt, which are primarily sold in the NAFTA region and Australia, and DAF trucks, which are sold in Europe and South America. Its trucks are sold through over 2,200 independent dealers globally. Paccar Financial Services provides retail and wholesale financing for customers and dealers, respectively. The company commands approximately 28% of the Class 8 market share in North America and 16% of the heavy-duty market share in Europe.
